item.description:
Do you ever go for sushi and wish you could try all the special rolls, not just one?  Do you love sushi but your friends or family are just not into it?  Do you want to expand your sushi horizons beyond California rolls and spicy tuna, and actually know what all those Japanese words on the menu mean?  This is the group for you!

 

We meet regularly once a month on Sunday nights, at sushi joints anywhere from New Haven to Hartford. Typically, we order a variety of special rolls and then split the bill (usually around $20 per person), but you are always free to order your own meal.
item.name: New Haven County Sushi Meetup Group
